Fales Library and Special Collections
DeCoursey Fales Art Collection
Fales, DeCoursey, 1888-1966
MSS.510
4 Linear Feet in 2 custom boxes
1854, undated The DeCoursey Fales Art Collection was created in September 2017 to prepare two paintings to be sent to offsite art storage in September 2017. The artworks consist of portraits of William Thackeray. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Processing Information
The collection was created in September 2017 to prepare two paintings to be sent to offsite art storage in September 2017. In 2021 the collection level description was updated for compliance with DACS and ACM Required Elements for Archival Description.
Historical Note
The DeCoursey Fales Art Collection was created in September 2017 to prepare two paintings identified as part of DeCoursey Fales's collection to be sent to offsite art storage in September 2017.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
No information was recorded about the acquisition of the materials in this collection.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; DeCoursey Fales Art Collection; MSS.510; box number; folder number; Fales Library & Special Collections, New York University.
Scope and Contents
The DeCoursey Fales Art Collection consists of two portraits of William Thackeray. One portrait dates from 1854 and is untitled and assumed to be of Thackeray and the other is undated and titled Portrait of William Thackeray.
Conditions Governing Use
The Fales Library & Special Collections has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1854, entered the public domain in 1974.
